meanings.definition: The act or process of traveling from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: During our itinerations, we visited many different cities.
meanings.sent2: Her itinerations for the summer included trips to the beach and the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The itinerations of the adventurous explorer led to exciting discoveries.
meanings.sent4: In the itinerations of life, we often find unexpected treasures along the way.
meanings.sent5: The itinerations of the migrating birds were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The repetition of a process or procedure.
meanings.sent1: The itinerations of the experiment were necessary to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent2: The itinerations of the recipe helped perfect the dish over time.
meanings.sent3: The itinerations of practicing the piano made her a skilled musician.
meanings.sent4: In the itinerations of learning, mistakes are just steps towards improvement.
meanings.sent5: The itinerations of training made him a master in his craft.
